experience: You and Phill both know Robert Haines, Wes Zimmerman, and 18 others

I help building owners and investors locate, lease up and/or sell their investments. For business owners, I help negotiate Triple Net (NNN), Modified Gross (MG) and Full Service (FS) leases, locate new space and navigate the CRE process. I am a Commercial Real Estate Broker with Commercial Properties, Inc. with over 14 years’ experience. I specializes in investments, sales & leasing with office, medical and retail space.  My aggressive standard of performance allows me to reach continuous growth through various market conditions. Hard work, integrity, and dedication have proven to be beneficial to my client’s success.
Designated Broker and Owner - a residential & commercial brokerage in North Scottsdale AZ

I worked with Kate at Commercial Properties, Inc. just over 3 1/2 years. She was one of two admins managing our  sales and leasing process for our Scottsdale location. One of the things I miss about Kate was her willingness to jump in and help with a smile. She is very efficient and with her attention to detail she took on more work projects than was required or expected and did a superb job. On her annual reviews, she always came in with high scores. Kate was a pleasure to work with and I would recommend her in any field!Phill

I find myself constantly saying "Thank You Mandy". I believe those of you who know her will agree with me. I have known Mandy almost 9 years and I am a huge fan! Mandy has worked many roles in her real estate career including my transaction coordinator, an office manager and now Associate Broker. Every role has been met with excellence, over achievement, great attitude, good work ethic and a willingness to help those around her. For those looking to work with Mandy, you will enjoy her personality and be well taken care of. She is one of the best and I highly recommend her (no matter what role she works in)…. Mandy, go get 'em!Phill

summary: Commercial Real Estate Broker with Commercial Properties, Inc. WHAT I DO: Specialize in Investment, Office, Medical and Retail markets in both Sales and Leasing in the North Valley. Over 13 years experience with negotiations skills in contracts, Triple Net (NNN), Modified Gross (MG) and Full Service (FS) leases. Active in professional organizations, including the Arizona Association of Economic Development (AAED) and CORFAC International. CORFAC is a worldwide real estate brokerage network, bringing together brokers from all over the world to discuss current events, investment opportunities, best practices and network.Contact me with any questions…ptomlinson@cpiz.com or 480-522-2800Twitter:  https://twitter.com/phillcreFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/commercialrealestateazView current commercial listings: http://www.commercialrealestateaz.com
name: Phill Tomlinson
title: Commercial RE Sales & Leasing - working with Investors, Landlords & Owner Users with their Investments | 480-522-2800
